item.title: How setup Hugo
item.description: How setup Hugo Download hugo (hugo_extended_0.69.0_Linux-64bit.tar.gz) from https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases and unpack to ~/.local/bin $ hugo new site personal-blog Output will be: Congratulations! Your new Hugo site is created in ~/personal-blog. Just a few more steps and you're ready to go: 1. Download a theme into the same-named folder. Choose a theme from https://themes.gohugo.io/ or create your own with the "hugo new theme <THEMENAME>" command. 2. Perhaps you want to add some content.
